thread.title: 2018 Toyota C-HR vs. 2017 Honda HR-V: Compare Cars
thread.title_full: 2018 Toyota C-HR vs. 2017 Honda HR-V: Compare Cars

author: John Voelcker (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: 2018 Toyota C-HR vs. 2017 Honda HR-V: Compare Cars
text: Small crossover utility vehicles have surged in popularity, and every carmaker is rolling out new entries. The Honda HR-V is already popular, and a year after it was launched, the Toyota C-HR is that maker's riposte. It's the little brother of the immensely popular RAV4 compact crossover, just as the HR-V is a smaller sibling to the equally...
